text: Sergio Frascoli (born March 14, 1936 in San Giorgio su Legnano) is a retired Italian professional football player. He played 6 seasons (113 games, 4 goals) in the Serie A for Aurora Pro Patria 1919, S.S.C. Venezia, A.S. Roma and SPAL 1907. ==External links== * Career summary by playerhistory.com Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Giorgio su Legnano Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Aurora Pro Patria 1919 players Category:A.C. title: Sergio Frascoli
